content.prompt: In the second paragraph, terms such as “amazingly”, “eerie”, and “illusions” emphasize which of the following?

choices.label: The power of the past to determine one’s future
The strangeness of the author’s experience in Bombay
The transformative power of the author’s imagination

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
